RSS Me!

RSS is now available and you can access RSS of this blog site at http://zhangwenli.com/blog/feed.xml.

Email Subscription

Since there's no ideal way to subscribe by email without a server, you may send me an email in one click so that I'll email you as soon as I post a new blog.

Thanks for your support! :smiley:
